text: Fuck the Suicide Prevention HotlineI had a mental health crisis last night  so I did what everyone tells you to do if you re experiencing a crisis  I contacted a suicide prevention hotline What an absolute fucking joke of a system  First I texted the crisis hotline  and was left in the queue for an hour  they re supposed to reach out to you in   minutes  so I opted out of the text line and actually called in   When I called in  I had a young woman pick up the other line  While I m sure she meant well  she gave the most canned  unauthentic and unhelpful responses to what I was saying   Oh  that sounds difficult  I m sorry you re feeling that way  have you tried taking a bath  It sounds like you re experiencing anxiety  have you tried doing the   grounding exercise  It would be highly advisable for you to seek counseling  therapy and or medication   Like Jesus Christ  if things were that goddamn easy then I wouldn t be calling in the first place  Of course I ve tried a bath and those stupid grousing exercises  Of course I want to find a therapist  it s hard finding someone that has openings and also takes my shitty state funded insurance and I d never be able to pay out of pocket because I m just a lowly cashier barely scraping by  If it were that easy  I d have this monster tackled by now  I have never felt worse than calling last night and have someone give me a scripted  robotic response back   I ended up getting frustrated and ending the call  slashed my leg open with a box knife to find some sort of mental relief  and cried myself to sleep  Fuck the suicide hotline  they don t help  They just throw a formulaic response at you to try and get you off the phone faster  they don t actually care
summary: Last night, a cashier had a mental health crisis and contacted a suicide prevention hotline. She was left in the queue for an hour. The young woman on the other line was unhelpful and gave her a formulaic response. She slashed her leg with a box knife to find some sort of mental relief.
cleaned: night cashier mental health crisis contact suicide prevention hotline leave queue hour young woman line unhelpful give formulaic response slash leg box knife find sort mental relief
